The role of the Project Manager is to pl: The role of the Project Manager is to plan, execute, and finalize IT infrastructure-related projects of various sizes and complexities according to strict requirements, deadlines, and defined budgets. This position will coordinate the efforts of internal IT and contractor/consultant teams through all phases of the Project Management Life Cycle (PMLC) to deliver projects according to plan. This includes communicating effectively across teams and with IT leadership, tracking overall project performance, cost, and schedule/milestones, maintaining project scope, and adhering to change management processes. The Project Manager is experienced and self-sufficient in performing his/her responsibilities, including project related decisions, requiring little supervision, but general guidance and direction.

Location: Raleigh, NC (preferred, but open to any US location)
